REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f3997 reute r f BC-LM-ERICSSON-<ERICY>-U 06-18 0067

TEXT.TITLE: LM ERICSSON <ERICY> UNIT INTRODUCING PRODUCT
TEXT.BODY: <LM Ericsson Telephone Co> of Sweden said its Ericsson unit in the U.S. introduced a cellular system for small cellular telephone markets. The company said its CMS 8800/S system incorporates Ericsson hardware and software. It said extra base stations and voice channels can be added to the system in modular blocks. Reuter
